name: Lifeling
description:
Lifeling is the story of Noah, a boy from a barren post apocalyptic world. Noah leaves his safe hidings and ventures to an ancient forgotten place, looking for answers underground. On the way he flees from dangerous enemies and makes strange allies.

System requirements:

  • 653 mb of free space.

If there are issues please comment.
If you like the game please tell someone about it. I have little means of advertisement.

You can listen to and download the soundtrack, on the Gamejolt page. https://gamejolt.com/games/Lifeling/321445
